messages.title: Why I'm Voting For Andrew
messages.content: Andrew would make a brilliant MP for Wimbledon. He understands local issues and takes time to talk and help residents. With his passion for environmental issues I think he'd deal with the global challenges that we face.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure streets are cleaned properly, parks improved, and new 'Merton Rule' to win national awards, requiring renewable energy in new non-residential buildings.
Change to a 2 tier system of primaries and secondaries with unprecedented investment in school buildings and sports facilities, decreasing overcrowded primary schools.

Lobby for a dedicated police team in every neighbourhood with a new police office, stronger licensing policy that restricts introduction of new council tax funded services to tackle anti-social behaviour.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Systemic Reform Of Our Political System
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promote thorough reform to ensure that politics is more democratic and accountable.

issues.education: Change to a 2 tier system of primaries and secondaries with unprecedented investment in school buildings and sports facilities.
issues.environment: Ensure streets are cleaned properly, parks improved, and new 'Merton Rule' to win national awards, requiring renewable energy in new non-residential buildings.
issues.governance: Promote thorough reform to ensure that politics is more democratic and accountable.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your MP, I will build my politics around your views, concerns and aspirations. This is obviously a difficult time, as we face the challenges of global recession, population increase and climate change. At the same time our political system has been found wanting. I believe that by acting together and being prepared to change the way things are done we can achieve much help and ensure a life of security and equality for succeeding generations.

endorsements.endorsement: Andrew would make a brilliant MP for Wimbledon. He understands local issues and takes time to talk and help residents. With his passion for environmental issues I think he'd deal with the global challenges that we face.

images.caption: Andrew and local supporters of a fairer and greener Wimbledon.
